name: Fill Up
description: An app that envelops learning to conserve water the fun way. Created by designers: Jessica Olson Sarah Lee and Developers: Pierre Tulifau, Mahendra Mishra and James Onwordi

name: Memories
description: Memories is an app that keeps the pictures of important events and provides the user with the option to keep a journal of the event

name: 3D Ludo
description: 3D-Ludo is a three dimensional board game that makes use of react, react-three-fiber and DOM manipulation

name: Creatube
description: CreaTube is an app that displays weapons stats, skins and video for a popular first-person shooter game Valaront. It makes use of PostgreSQL, EJS, Express.js and Valaront's API
skills: JavaScript, Tailwind, Node, Express, PostgreSQL, REST
